frontend_description: Passionate Frontend Developer with expertise in modern web technologies including React, Next.js, and TypeScript. Strong foundation in creating responsive, user-friendly applications with clean code architecture. Experienced in full-stack development with MongoDB and Supabase. Committed to continuous learning and implementing best practices in web development.
projects_description: A collection of my recent works and personal projects showcasing my skills in building modern, responsive, and user-friendly web applications.

hero.title: Welcome to Our Website
hero.subtitle: We provide you with the best digital solutions that meet your needs and keep up with your future aspirations

projects_.title: Our Projects
projects_.subtitle: Browse a collection of our most prominent diverse projects

ecommerce.name: E-Commerce Application
ecommerce.description: Developed a fully responsive e-commerce platform with comprehensive features including product browsing, category filtering, user authentication, shopping cart management, and wishlist functionality. Implemented global state management and modern UI components.

articles.name: Article Management System
articles.description: Built a full-stack blogging platform with complete content management capabilities allowing users to create, update, delete, and comment on articles. Implemented authentication, protected routes, and real-time UI updates using Next.js server actions.

restaurant.name: Restaurant Booking System
restaurant.description: Created a comprehensive restaurant booking platform with secure database operations, custom hooks, clean code architecture, and reusable components. Implemented loading states, toast notifications, and success UI with responsive design.

servare.name: Servare - Blogging Platform API
servare.description: Developed a comprehensive RESTful API for a blogging platform with user authentication, article management, and comment system. Implemented secure JWT-based authentication, CRUD operations, and search functionality with MongoDB integration.

cardGame.name: Card Matching Game
cardGame.description: Interactive memory game with score tracking and responsive design for all device sizes. Features engaging gameplay with smooth animations and intuitive user interface.

about_.title: About Me
about_.description: I am a passionate frontend developer with experience in the latest web technologies
